DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_META_TRIMESTRAL_VICE_PRESIDENTE
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT SUM(A.VALORMETA) PLANEJADO,
(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(VALORTOTAL+RECORRENTE+VALORSAAS),0)
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES
WHERE DATEPART(QUARTER,DATAFECHAMENTO) = DATEPART(QUARTER,GETDATE())
AND STATUS = 10) REALIZADO
FROM K_CRM_METASPERIODOS A
WHERE YEAR(GETDATE()) = YEAR(A.DATA)
AND DATEPART(QUARTER,A.DATA) = DATEPART(QUARTER,GETDATE())" /> <Fields> <DecimalField Alias="PLANEJADO" From="A" Path="PLANEJADO" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <DecimalField Alias="REALIZADO" From="A" Path="REALIZADO" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
